name: mocker-data-generator
description: A simplified way to generate mock data, build over Faker

scripts.build: rm -rf build && npm run build:development && npm run build:production
scripts.build:production: NODE_ENV=production COMPRESS=1 webpack --config webpack.config.base.js lib/main.js --target node --output-library-target umd --output-library MockerData build/mocker.min.js && echo "gzipped, the global build is `gzip -c build/mocker.min.js | wc -c` bytes"
scripts.build:development: NODE_ENV=development webpack --config webpack.config.base.js lib/main.js --target node --output-library-target umd --output-library MockerData build/mocker.js  && echo "gzipped, the global build is `gzip -c build/mocker.js | wc -c` bytes"
scripts.dev:watch: webpack --watch --config webpack.config.base.js lib/main.js --target node --output-library-target umd --output-library MockerData build/mocker.js
